GNüåô CoinRank Evening Headlines!

#Jupiter announced plans to integrate the prediction market Polymarket, signaling deeper convergence between #DeFi trading and #predictionmarkets.

An address dubbed the ‚Äú1011 insider whale‚Äù ranked first in realized profits on Hyperliquid, highlighting outsized #whale gains amid elevated #derivatives activity.

Blockchain security firm PeckShield reported that crypto-related thefts totaled $86 million in January 2026, underscoring persistent #security risks across the #crypto sector.

The #CryptoQuant CEO said the market is unlikely to repeat the previous cycle‚Äôs 70% crash as long as Strategy does not engage in large-scale selling, pointing to continued #institutional influence.

Several tokens including HYPE, BERA, and XDC are set for large unlocks next week, with HYPE alone facing unlocks valued at roughly $305 million, raising concerns over short-term #supplypressure.

#CoinRank

**$HYPE /USDT ‚Äì 4H (BingX)**  After a **strong impulsive rally**, HYPE is now **consolidating near highs**, printing a tight range just below the recent peak. This is **trend continuation vs distribution** territory.  **Technical Read**  * **Trend:** Bullish structure intact, higher highs & higher lows. * **MAs:** Price holding above **MA30**, while **MA5/MA10** are flattening ‚Üí short-term balance. * **Price Action:** Sideways compression around **29‚Äì30** after expansion = market deciding next leg. * **Volume:** Elevated but stabilizing, no panic selling yet.  **Key Levels**  * **Resistance:** 31.5‚Äì32.5 (recent top / supply). * **Support:** 28.5‚Äì29.0 (range low + MA30). Loss of this weakens structure.  **Bias**  * Hold above **29** ‚Üí bullish continuation possible. * Breakdown below **28.5** ‚Üí deeper pullback toward **26‚Äì27**.  Range break or fake-out before the next move? #HYPE  #CryptoTA  #BingX

If the positive momentum continues, it will go to 32.562.      - In case the price fails to exceed 31.561 and there is a clear reversal, we might see a drop to retest the support at 30.238 and then 29.237.      - If 27.420 is broken strongly and stays below it, the outlook changes and I expect the decline to continue, making the scenario negative at that time.   - üí° Remember: Do not enter a trade unless you see clear confirmation like a pin bar or engulfing or reversal on smaller time frames. And the stop loss should be below the last low or above the last high according to the direction of the trade.    üìù This analysis is for educational purposes only, dear Sultan, and should not be considered investment advice. Crypto Watchlist for the week ahead:

$ONDO - Ondo Summit starts on Feb. 3

$LDO - Lido V3 will launch on Feb. 3

$FT - Flying Tulip's ICO on CoinList starts on Feb. 2. It will offer a full refund option

$FLUID - Venus Flux, a new instance of Fluid money market, launches on Feb. 4

$ANON - Hey Anon will release a new prediction market product (Pandora Parlays for Polymarket) on Feb. 2

$OP - Optimism will use 50% of its Superchain revenue to buy back OP tokens starting February

$IP - Story's $82M buyback program for IP just ended today

$JUP - Jupiter is set to make a few additional big announcements at the CatLumpurr event tomorrow

$HYPE - 140k HYPE tokens will be distributed to the Hyperliquid team on Feb. 6

$ZAMA - Zama TGE will happen on Feb. 2

$CHZ - Chiliz Vision 2030 will be announced on Feb. 3

$MSTR - Saylor's Strategy earnings call is scheduled for Feb. 5

Macro events - US Unemployment Rate will be announced on Feb. 6

$BERA: 41% of $BERA circulating supply ($31M at current prices) will be unlocked on Feb. 6

If you enjoyed reading this, a like and a repost would be appreciatedü´°

üî•LATEST: The infamous Hyperunit whale (tied to ex-BitForex CEO Garrett Jin) just got absolutely wrecked.   Closed out their massive leveraged $ETH  long on Hyperliquid, locking in a brutal $250 million loss as ETH tanked to around $2,400 in the latest sell-off. What started as a killer play (they'd previously banked ~$200M shorting the tariff crash) turned into a nightmare after building the position up to over $730M notional value mid-January, only to get wiped to basically nothing‚Äîaccount's sitting at just $53 now on that Hyperliquid $HYPE  side. Crypto leverage is savage, man‚Äîone wrong directional bet and months of gains evaporate overnight. Who's still long ETH here, or are we all waiting for the bottom?  Ôªø#BTC Price Analysis#  #ETH  #HYPE

Hyperliquid $HYPE is trading within a key range as momentum cools after recent volatility. Buyers are showing up at support, but bulls need a clean break above resistance to unlock the next leg up.

* Support: $28.50 ‚Äì $27.80
* Resistance: $32.20 ‚Äì $33.00

A hold above support keeps the bullish structure intact, while a breakout above resistance could trigger renewed upside pressure. 

Failure to hold support opens the door for a deeper pullback.
   Watch volume and reaction at these levels closely.

#Altcoin Season# #Hyperliquid #Meme Alpha# #Macro Insights# #HYPE
xrp is still 13x the fdv of hyperliquid, couple more devastating nukes to go lol

üî• LATEST: The infamous Hyperunit whale (tied to ex-BitForex CEO Garrett Jin) just got absolutely wrecked.

Closed out their massive leveraged  $ETH long on Hyperliquid, locking in a brutal $250 million loss as ETH tanked to around $2,400 in the latest sell-off. Crypto leverage is savage, man-one wrong directional bet and months of gains evaporate overnight. Who's still long ETH here, or are we all waiting for the bottom?

A long setup is advisable if we see a clear reversal there (e.g. pin bar or bullish engulfing candle). Entry idea: enter upon confirmation in the range 28.73‚Äì28.48, first targets: 30.59 and 31.46, further 32.20. - Should the price fall below 27.42 and not show a strong reversal there, I expect further downward pressure. - My bias would turn to short if 28.48 is significantly broken and not immediately reclaimed ‚Äì then 27.42 and lower are likely to be reached. - Stop-loss should always be adjusted to the last swing low for longs (e.g. below 27.42) or swing high for shorts. - Wait for clear confirmation: without a clear reversal signal, it is better not to open a position! $HYPE  grew amid a general decline in the crypto market. A number of experts began to view the asset as a tool for preserving capital, noted CoinDesk analyst Omkar Godbole. While #Bitcoin  and #Ethereum  were losing value, #HyperLiquid  markets reached record highs. Open interest exceeded $1 billion, and daily trading volume reached $4.8 billion, the publication's expert emphasized. The surge in activity was linked to the HIP-3 initiative. The update allowed the creation of trading pairs for cryptocurrencies, stocks, and gold, provided that 500,000 #HYPE  were staked.  Over the week, the HYPE rate rose by 41%. The price of the first cryptocurrency fell by more than 11% over the same period, and many altcoins showed an even deeper decline.

Hyperliquid said HyperCore will add outcome trading via HIP-4, introducing fully collateralized, range-settled contracts for use cases like prediction markets and bounded options, without leverage or liquidations. The feature is currently on testnet, with USDH-denominated canonical markets planned after further development and user feedback.  https://t.co/CSgizOAPi4

Hyperliquid tests 'Outcomes,' moving into booming prediction markets and limited risk options trading https://www.theblock.co/post/388023/hyperliquid-outcome-prediction-markets-limited-risk-options-trading?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social

The native token of Hyperliquid has risen amidst a general downturn in the crypto market. Some experts are now viewing the asset as a capital preservation tool, noted CoinDesk analyst Omkar Godbole.

https://forklog.com/en/hype-token-surges-despite-bitcoin-correction/

ü§îHAPPENING NOW: HYPERLIQUID SET TO LAUNCH PREDICTION MARKETS?

In a recent X post, @HyperliquidX disclosed that HyperCore will support outcome trading. 

According to the post, outcomes are fully collateried contracts that settle within a fixed range, as such, they can be useful for applications such as prediction markets. 

It would be interesting if Hyperliquid joins the prediction markets space!
